name: The Herd Pre-Alpha
description:
Zombie shooter that the user has to travel from one place to another and be able to shoot/ hit anything that’s in his way. The scene must be in an open street with cars either side of the road. You should only be able to see the bow on your screen. 

The code used is with a program called dark basic classic made by the game creators

Please note that this game was made for a college course and has had no work done to it since (reason why it is a demo). If this game gets multiple downloads i will look into rebuilding this in a different/ more up to date program.
